original_text: When David had fled and made his escape, he went to Samuel at Ramah and told him all that Saul had done to him. Then he and Samuel went to Naioth and stayed there.
korean_text: 다윗이 도피하여 라마로 가서 사무엘에게로 나아가서 사울이 자기에게 행한 일을 다 전하였고 다윗과 사무엘이 나욧으로 가서 살았더라

sentences.original_text: When David had fled and made his escape
he went to Samuel at Ramah
and told him all that Saul had done to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사울이 자기에게 행한 모든 것을 그에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: Then he and Samuel went to Naioth
